lyrics:
Hello helluva, hey, how you doing?
It's me the mac of BHC pursuing you
Who in the world gave you the right
To look so well, oh my (Dynamite!)

Suckin' on a pickle with a now or later in the middle
How I feel for you girl, it's no riddle (I want her)

Yeah, I got to have her
She looks more better so I want her more badder
Than a big man in quick sand could hope for help
At a glance, I'ma go for self

She's as cute as a puss in boots
With good hair and it's real to the roots
Damn near perfect, all my life
I prayed for an all world girl
Who's as sweet as Kool Aid

(And thoughts of doin' that) It can make me cry
You're a helluva babe, oh me, oh my

Helluva, helluva (She's so fine)
Helluva, helluva (Blows my mind)
Helluva, helluva (Lights my beam)
Helluva, helluva

She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life
She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life

I'm not the kind'f a man to bye
'Cause I rhyme to survive
I guess I'm doing alright
'Cause I'm staying alive

I'm in the game of fame
Gangs of girls want my last name
Not for love
But for life in the fast lane

Gold diggers see dollar
So they scream and holler
At my concerts
Hoping I notice 'em but it don't work

'Cause I hate a girl loud as a speaker
Don't get me wrong, I also hate salad eaters
Only's been bid to those in the middle of the two extremes
Yeah, you know what I mean

Love is blind but I see good
I think you're helluva, helluva, agreed, B-Hood? (yeah)
Yeah, I knew you'd agree
There's no mistaking she's b-a-d

I court her, sport her
Escort her and support her
She's the talk of the town
And I'm the reporter

She's helluva, helluva

Helluva, helluva (She's so fine)
Helluva, helluva (Blows my mind)
Helluva, helluva (Lights my beam)
Helluva, helluva

She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life
She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life

We're still lovey dovey
But it ain't all roses
'Cause she's so helluva
In other brother's noses

We can't even go in the mall
Walking without brothers gawking
Stalking and talking that talk about
What they'd do if they were me
But she's locked up and if ain't the key

I heard a brother whistle
I said what if it's time I met him and pulled out my pistol
Loaded the clip and started git git gatting
(What happened?) She broke start macking

Bend down and tell him, it's not 'cause I'm jealous
Hey, just don't disrespect me, fella
Now she's mad 'cause she thinks that I'm violent
The treatment I get is silence

So you all bro know next time you slip there's a fee
(You gotta pay) Hey, 'cause helluva's with me, me

Helluva, helluva (She's so fine)
Helluva, helluva (Blows my mind)
Helluva, helluva (Lights my beam)
Helluva, helluva

She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life
She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life

She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life
She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life

She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life
She's a helluva girl, yeah
I want in my life
